jNetDev
Class jND_Utility

java.lang.Object
  jNetDev.jND_Utility

public class jND_Utility
extends java.lang.Object

jND_Utility
This is a class of all static methods that provide a variety of utility functions.

jND_Utility

public jND_Utility()
Method Detail

debug

public static void debug(java.lang.String message)
Method to print debug info to stdout. Printing only occurs if the static int debugFlag is non-zero. Use the debugSet() method to set the value of debugFlag.

Parameters:
message - - the string to be printed.

debugSet

public static void debugSet(boolean value)
Method to set the value of debugFlag. This flag turns debug messages printed via debug on or off. By default they are on. Passing in a non-zero value turns debugging on, while a zero turns it off.

Parameters:
value - - the new value of debugFlag

byte1ToHex

public static java.lang.String byte1ToHex(jND_BYTE1 byte1)
                                   throws jND_Exception
Method to convert a 1-byte integer to a 2-digit hexadecimal string.

Parameters:
byte1 - - the 1-byte integer to be converted.
Returns:
a String containing the hex byte.
Throws:
jND_Exception

byte4ToHex

public static java.lang.String byte4ToHex(jND_BYTE4 byte4,
                                          int len)
Method to convert a 4-byte integer to a hexadecimal string. Actually, the 'len' right most bytes of the 4-byte integer are converted.

Parameters:
byte4 - - the 4-byte value to be converted.
len - - the # of bytes to actually convert.
Returns:
a String containing the hex value in 2*len digits.

byte8ToHex

public static java.lang.String byte8ToHex(jND_BYTE8 byte8,
                                          int len)
Method to convert an 8-byte integer to a hexadecimal string. Actually, the 'len' right most bytes of the 8-byte integer are converted.

Parameters:
byte8 - - the 8-byte value to be converted.
len - - the # of bytes to actually convert.
Returns:
a String containing the hex value in 2*len digits.

a String with the name of the type.

checkSum

public static int checkSum(byte[] pkt,
                           int length)
Method to compute a 16-bit checksum of a packet

Parameters:
pkt - - the packet to sum.
length - - the length of the packet.
Returns:
the checksum as an int.

transportCheckSum

public static int transportCheckSum(int protocol,
                                    jND_IPv4Address insrcIP,
                                    jND_IPv4Address indstIP,
                                    byte[] pkt)
Method to compute a 16-bit transport checksum of a packet. The transport checksum is based on the packet plus a pseudo header made up of:

source IP address (4 bytes)

destination IP address (4 bytes)

length of the packet (2 bytes)

protocol number (udp=17) (2 bytes)

Parameters:
protocol - - the transport layer protocol number
insrcIP - - the source IP address
indstIP - - the destination IP addresss
pkt - - the packet to sum
Returns:
the checksum as an int

arpFor

public static byte[] arpFor(jND_NIC nic,
                            byte[] ipAddress)
Method to ARP for an IP address and return the MAC address as a byte array. If the IP address is on the same subnet as the NIC, the arp is for that IP. If the IP is on another subnet, then arpFor substitutes the IP of the gateway for that of the given IP address.

Parameters:
nic - - the NIC to use for the ARP
ipAddress - - the protocol address to lookup
Returns:
the MAC address corresponding the the 'ipAddr'
